message.body: Bebe, I'll be in your hood on Friday. Will you be?
Din din? with Tim? My bf and sure t. Dwight tooo
Haha, sounds absolutely enchanting! Anywhere special? Is Kevin invited? (doesn't have to be, lol)
Maybe somewhere in the area, not important to me! If you have someplace in mind, we're down. Of course, bring Kev Kev :)!!
Oh, I just didn't know if you wanted loring pasta bar ;)
Well I always do but my pocketbook doesn't... :)
Haha, I hear that, grrrrrrl. There are tons of good places that are close.Â
